alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 29 at 11:46AM MST until November 29 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST /3 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Lea and Central Lea Counties. In Texas, Gaines, Dawson, Andrews, Martin, Ector and Midland Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CST /3 PM MST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
